source.cb6b2d02:
def visualize(current):
    Y = os.listdir(current)
    ims = ti.imread(Y)
    ti.imshow(ims)

source.a260f82d:
def imgshow(foldername,filename):
    iaddress  = os.path.join(dir,foldername)
    cc = os.listdir(iaddress)
    ffad = os.path.join(iaddress,cc[0],filename)
    f =ti.imread(ffad)
    ti.imshow(f)
